Rep.ReportSql: select g.ReceiptId, g.SerialNumbers, g.SkuCode, g.State, g.ItemName, g.Quantity, g.CheckQuantity, (select SendInTime from stock_batchlocation where SerialNumbers = g.SerialNumbers) as SendInTime, (select WhsName from warehouse where WhsId = g.WmsId) as WmsName from goodsreceiptline g join sku s on s.SkuCode = g.SkuCode where @Param1
Rep.TotalSql: select count(0) from goodsreceiptline g join sku s on s.SkuCode = g.SkuCode where @Param1
